snippet: Kathryn Morgan, a former New York City Ballet soloist, left the stage for two years because of a thyroid condition. Now, she’s trying to return.
abstract: Former New York City Ballet soloist Kathryn Morgan, who was forced to leave company in 2012 because of thyroid condition, is trying to make a comeback; after starting YouTube channel documenting her illness and recovery, she has recently shed 25 pounds and is back in New York to begin auditioning for ballet companies again.
lead_paragraph: Kathryn Morgan, a former New York City Ballet soloist, left the stage for two years because of a thyroid condition. Now, she’s trying to return.

headline.seo: Kathryn Morgan Uses Social Media as She Gears for Her Return
headline.main: Betrayed by Her Body, a Dancer Connects Online
headline.print_headline: Betrayed by Her Body, a Dancer Connects Online
